name: NOAAMarineAlert
0:
”Alexa, ask NOAA Marine alerts in Alaska”
”Alexa, ask NOAA Marine to give me alerts in Great Lakes”
”Alexa, ask NOAA Marine alerts in Pacific”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: noaa marine
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The skill provide you all the marine alerts from NOAA and NWS in the following marine zones:
- Alaska
- Atlantic
- Great Lakes 
- Gulf of Mexico
- Pacific
- Pacific Islands.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
